name: Shin Ramyun Noodle Soup
ingredients: Wheat Flour, Palm Oil, Potato Starch, Modified Potato Starch, Salt, Beef Bone Extract, Monosodium Glutamate, Dehydrated Vegetables (Mushroom, Green Onion, Carrot), Red Pepper, Sugar, Soy Sauce (Soy, Wheat, Salt), Yeast Extract, Black Pepper, Garlic, Onion, Ginger, Disodium Inosinate, Disodium Guanylate, Sodium Carbonate, Oleoresin Capsicum, Oleoresin Paprika, Sodium Phosphates, Sodium Polyphosphate, Soybean Sprout Extract, Tocopherols (Antioxidant), Citric Acid, Riboflavin (Color), Dehydrated Seaweed
